metadata.title: CVE-2018-14523 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in aubio 0.4.6. A buffer over-read can occur innew_aubio_pitchyinfft in pitch/pitchyinfft.c, as demonstrated byaubionotes.

criterions.comment: aubio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
